english_descriptive: a particle used to express emotions like surprise, exclamation, or agreement
example_en: Ah, you came!

english_descriptive: used to refer politely to a woman of your parents’ generation
example_pinyin: Āyí, wǒ lái bāng nín ná dōngxi.
example_en: Auntie, I’ll help you carry the things.

english_descriptive: having less than average height
example_en: He is a little shorter than me.

english_descriptive: an activity a person enjoys doing in their free time
example_en: My hobby is drawing.

english_descriptive: free from noise; calm and serene
example_en: This place is very quiet.

english_descriptive: used to indicate a handful of something or a certain object with a handle
example_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yì bǎ yǐzi.
example_en: I bought a chair.

english_descriptive: a group of students taught together or a team/group of people
example_pinyin: Wǒmen bān yǒu èrshí gè xuésheng.
example_en: Our class has twenty students.

english_descriptive: to relocate objects or oneself from one place to another
example_en: We are moving this weekend.

english_descriptive: a way to solve a problem or accomplish a task
example_cn: 这个问题没有办法解决。
example_en: There’s no way to solve this problem.

english_descriptive: a room or building where people work
example_en: The teacher works in the office.

english_descriptive: one of two equal parts; fifty percent of something
example_pinyin: Wǒ chī le yí bàn de dàngāo.
example_en: I ate half of the cake.

english_descriptive: to assist someone in doing something
example_pinyin: Qǐng nǐ bāngmáng bān yíxià zhuōzi.
example_en: Please help move the table.

english_descriptive: a container to carry items; or the action of wrapping
example_pinyin: Tā bēi zhe yí gè bāo.
example_en: She is carrying a bag.

english_descriptive: the northern part of a country or region
example_en: The winters in the north are very cold.

english_descriptive: used to indicate that the subject is acted upon
example_pinyin: Wǒ de shǒujī bèi tā ná zǒu le.
example_en: My phone was taken by him.

english_descriptive: the part of the face used for breathing and smelling
example_pinyin: Tā yǒu yí gè dà bízi.
example_en: He has a big nose.

english_descriptive: to evaluate differences or similarities between things
example_pinyin: Zhège píngguǒ bǐ nà gè dà.
example_en: This apple is bigger than that one.

english_descriptive: used to indicate a comparison or relative degree
example_en: It’s relatively cold today.

english_descriptive: an event where people compete to win
example_en: He participated in the soccer competition.

english_descriptive: a book used for writing notes
example_cn: 我买了一个新的笔记本。
example_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yí gè xīn de bǐjìběn.
example_en: I bought a new notebook.

english_descriptive: used to indicate necessity or obligation
example_en: You must finish your homework.

english_descriptive: a difference or transformation in condition or situation
example_pinyin: Tiānqì yǒu le hěn dà biànhuà.
example_en: The weather has changed a lot.

english_descriptive: people other than oneself
example_en: Don’t worry about other people’s business.

english_descriptive: an appliance used to keep food cold
example_pinyin: Bīngxiāng lǐ yǒu hěn duō shuǐguǒ.
example_en: There are a lot of fruits in the refrigerator.

english_descriptive: used to indicate that something is true in addition to something else
example_cn: 他不但会唱歌，而且会跳舞。
example_pinyin: Tā búdàn huì chànggē, érqiě huì tiàowǔ.
example_en: He can not only sing, but also dance.

english_descriptive: used to add extra information, similar to 'and also'
example_pinyin: Tā hěn cōngming, érqiě hěn nǔlì.
example_en: She is smart, and also very hardworking.

english_descriptive: a list of food or drink options available at a restaurant
example_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ yí fèn càidān.
example_en: Please give me a menu.

english_descriptive: to take part in an event or activity
example_en: I will participate in the meeting tomorrow.

english_descriptive: green plants that cover the ground in fields or yards
example_pinyin: Gōngyuán lǐ yǒu hěn duō cǎo.
example_en: There is a lot of grass in the park.

english_descriptive: used for counting floors of a building or layers of something
example_en: I live on the third floor.

english_descriptive: a large store selling food and household goods
example_en: I’m going to the supermarket to buy things.

english_descriptive: a piece of clothing worn on the upper body
example_pinyin: Tā chuān le yí jiàn bái chènshān.
example_en: He is wearing a white shirt.

english_descriptive: the outcome or score achieved in a test or task
example_pinyin: Wǒ de kǎoshì chéngjì hěn hǎo.
example_en: My exam result is very good.

english_descriptive: a large town or urban area
example_pinyin: Běijīng shì yí gè dà chéngshì.
example_en: Beijing is a big city.

english_descriptive: to arrive after the scheduled time
example_pinyin: Tā jīntiān yòu chídào le yí cì.
example_en: He was late again today.

english_descriptive: used to indicate exclusion or addition
example_pinyin: Chúle wǒ, dàjiā dōu qù le.
example_en: Except for me, everyone went.

english_descriptive: a vessel for traveling on water
example_pinyin: Wǒmen zuò chuán qù dǎo shàng.
example_en: We took a boat to the island.

english_descriptive: the season between winter and summer
example_en: The flowers bloom in spring.

english_descriptive: a book that lists words and their meanings
example_en: I look up new words in the dictionary.

english_descriptive: having good intelligence or quick understanding
example_pinyin: Tā hěn cōngming, xuéxí hěn kuài.
example_en: He is smart and learns quickly.

english_descriptive: to make a place tidy or free of dirt
example_en: I clean my room every day.

english_descriptive: to intend or make arrangements for something
example_en: I plan to go swimming tomorrow.

english_descriptive: to carry something with you
example_en: Please bring your passport.

english_descriptive: to feel anxious or concerned about something
example_pinyin: Bùyào dānxīn, yíqiè huì hǎo de.
example_en: Don’t worry, everything will be fine.

english_descriptive: a sweet baked dessert
example_en: I like to eat chocolate cake.

english_descriptive: used to emphasize certainty or agreement
example_en: Of course you can come.

english_descriptive: used to connect an adjective or verb to modify another verb
example_en: He laughed happily.

english_descriptive: a device that produces light
example_pinyin: Fángjiān lǐ de dēng hěn liàng.
example_en: The light in the room is very bright.

english_descriptive: a location or area
example_cn: 这里是一个安静的地方。
example_pinyin: Zhèlǐ shì yí gè ānjìng de dìfang.
example_en: This is a quiet place.

english_descriptive: an underground urban train system
example_en: I take the subway to work every day.

english_descriptive: a representation of an area showing geographic features
example_en: I need a map.

english_descriptive: a platform or compartment that moves people or goods up and down in a building
example_en: Please take the elevator upstairs.

english_descriptive: an electronic message sent over the internet
example_pinyin: Wǒ fā le yì fēng diànzǐ yóujiàn.
example_en: I sent an email.

english_descriptive: the cardinal direction opposite to west
example_en: The sun rises in the east.

english_descriptive: the coldest season of the year, after autumn and before spring
example_en: It often snows in winter.

english_descriptive: a living creature that is not a human or plant
example_pinyin: Dòngwùyuán lǐ yǒu hěn duō dòngwù.
example_en: There are many animals in the zoo.

english_descriptive: having little length or duration
example_pinyin: Zhè tiáo kùzi tài duǎn le.
example_en: These pants are too short.

english_descriptive: a part of a larger whole, often a portion of time or space
example_pinyin: Wǒ dú le yí duàn gùshi.
example_en: I read a section of the story.

english_descriptive: to perform physical activities to stay healthy
example_cn: 每天早上我都锻炼身体。
example_pinyin: Měitiān zǎoshang wǒ dōu duànliàn shēntǐ.
example_en: I exercise every morning.

english_descriptive: used to emphasize the degree of a quality
example_en: How smart you are!

english_descriptive: feeling the need for food
example_pinyin: Wǒ hěn è, yào chīfàn le.
example_en: I’m very hungry, it’s time to eat.

english_descriptive: the organ used for hearing
example_en: His ears are big.

english_descriptive: to deliver or distribute something
example_pinyin: Wǒ fā le yì tiáo xiāoxi.
example_en: I sent a message.

english_descriptive: to experience an elevated body temperature due to illness
example_en: He had a fever yesterday.

english_descriptive: to find or realize something new
example_pinyin: Wǒ fāxiàn le yì běn hǎo shū.
example_en: I discovered a good book.

english_descriptive: easy to use or access; not causing difficulty
example_en: This shop is very convenient.

english_descriptive: to place something somewhere
example_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ shū fàng zài zhuōzi shàng.
example_en: Please put the book on the table.

english_descriptive: to feel relieved and not worry
example_cn: 你可以放心，我会照顾好他。
example_pinyin: Nǐ kěyǐ fàngxīn, wǒ huì zhàogù hǎo tā.
example_en: You can rest assured, I will take care of him.

english_descriptive: used to indicate time in minutes or to separate something into parts
example_pinyin: Xiànzài shì sān diǎn shí fēn.
example_en: It’s 3:10 now.

english_descriptive: the area close to a location
example_pinyin: Wǒ jiā fùjìn yǒu yí gè chāoshì.
example_en: There is a supermarket near my house.

english_descriptive: to go over previously learned material
example_pinyin: Kǎoshì qián wǒ yào fùxí yǔfǎ.
example_en: I need to review grammar before the exam.

english_descriptive: free from dirt or impurities
example_en: The room is clean.

english_descriptive: to become ill with cold symptoms
example_en: He caught a cold and needs to rest.

english_descriptive: to have curiosity or enthusiasm for something
example_en: I am interested in history.

english_descriptive: a short time ago
example_en: He came just now.

english_descriptive: the physical stature or build of a person
example_en: He is tall.

english_descriptive: used to indicate basis or source for information or action
example_cn: 根据天气预报，明天会下雨。
example_pinyin: Gēnjù tiānqì yùbào, míngtiān huì xià yǔ.
example_en: According to the weather forecast, it will rain tomorrow.

english_descriptive: to accompany someone or follow instructions
example_pinyin: Wǒ gēn tā yìqǐ qù xuéxiào.
example_en: I’m going to school with him.

english_descriptive: used to indicate a higher degree than before
example_en: He is even taller.

english_descriptive: a public green space for recreation
example_en: We are going to the park for a walk.

english_descriptive: a narrative about events or experiences
example_cn: 爷爷给我讲了一个故事。
example_pinyin: Yéye gěi wǒ jiǎng le yí gè gùshi.
example_en: Grandfather told me a story.

english_descriptive: used to describe when the wind is blowing strongly
example_en: It’s very windy today.

english_descriptive: to shut something such as a door, window, or device
example_en: Please close the door.

english_descriptive: the connection or association between people or things
example_pinyin: Tāmen yǒu hěn hǎo de guānxi.
example_en: They have a very good relationship.

english_descriptive: to show concern or interest in someone or something
example_cn: 父母很关心孩子的学习。
example_pinyin: Fùmǔ hěn guānxīn háizi de xuéxí.
example_en: Parents care a lot about their children's studies.

english_descriptive: used to indicate the topic of something
example_en: This book is about history.

english_descriptive: a nation with its own government, territory, and population
example_pinyin: Zhōngguó shì yí gè dà guójiā.
example_en: China is a big country.

english_descriptive: used to indicate past experiences or the act of passing time
example_en: I have been to Beijing.

english_descriptive: used to ask a choice between two or more options
example_pinyin: Nǐ xiǎng hē chá háishi kāfēi?
example_en: Do you want tea or coffee?

english_descriptive: to feel fear or worry about something
example_en: He is afraid of the dark.

english_descriptive: a board for writing on with chalk, typically in classrooms
example_en: The teacher writes on the blackboard.

english_descriptive: an official document for international travel identifying the holder
example_en: Please show your passport.

english_descriptive: a plant with colorful petals; also to use resources on something
example_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yí shù huā.
example_en: I bought a bouquet of flowers.

english_descriptive: to produce pictures using pen, pencil, or brush
example_en: She likes to draw.

english_descriptive: not good or functioning poorly
example_en: This phone is broken.

english_descriptive: to greet or receive someone with pleasure
example_en: Welcome to our school.

english_descriptive: the surroundings or conditions in which a person, animal, or plant lives or operates
example_en: We should protect the environment.

english_descriptive: to replace or switch something with another
example_pinyin: Wǒ huàn le yí jiàn xīn yīfu.
example_en: I changed into new clothes.

english_descriptive: the second longest river in China, known as the cradle of Chinese civilization
example_pinyin: Huáng Hé liú jīng hěn duō shěngfèn.
example_en: The Yellow River flows through many provinces.

english_descriptive: a gathering of people to discuss topics or make decisions
example_pinyin: Wǒmen xiàwǔ yǒu yí gè huìyì.
example_en: We have a meeting this afternoon.

english_descriptive: the impact, purpose, or role of something
example_pinyin: Zhè zhǒng yào de zuòyòng hěn dà.
example_en: This medicine has a strong effect.

english_descriptive: referring to a time or events that have already happened
example_cn: 过去的事情不要再想了。
example_pinyin: Guòqù de shìqíng bú yào zài xiǎng le.
example_en: Don’t think about past events anymore.

english_descriptive: used to indicate continuation or addition
example_en: I haven’t eaten yet.

english_descriptive: to respond to a question or message
example_en: Please answer the teacher’s question.

english_descriptive: feeling worried or needing immediate attention
example_pinyin: Tā hěn jí, yào qù yīyuàn.
example_en: He is anxious and needs to go to the hospital.

english_descriptive: to give instruction or impart knowledge
example_en: The teacher teaches us Chinese.

english_descriptive: depending on context, either to formally teach or to indicate a name
example_cn: 他叫李明，老师教我们数学。
example_pinyin: Tā jiào Lǐ Míng, lǎoshī jiào wǒmen shùxué.
example_en: He is called Li Ming; the teacher instructs us in math.

english_descriptive: a planned show or segment for entertainment or information
example_en: Tonight’s program is very good.

english_descriptive: to gain knowledge or comprehension of something
example_en: I want to understand Chinese culture.

english_descriptive: a small, round fruit that grows in clusters on vines
example_en: I like to eat grapes.

english_descriptive: indicates the beginning of an action or a change in state
example_pinyin: Wǒ zǎoshang liù diǎn qǐchuáng qǐlái.
example_en: I get up at 6 a.m.

english_descriptive: the study of numbers, shapes, and patterns
example_en: I like studying mathematics.

english_descriptive: having the taste characteristic of sugar or honey
example_en: This cake is very sweet.

english_descriptive: a regular practice or routine; to be accustomed to
example_en: I am used to getting up early.

english_descriptive: a portable container for packing personal belongings when traveling
example_pinyin: Wǒ yǒu yí gè dà xínglǐxiāng.
example_en: I have a big suitcase.

english_descriptive: the father of one's father
example_en: Grandfather likes to tell stories.

english_descriptive: used to indicate something happens in most cases or normally
example_pinyin: Wǒ yìbān zǎoshang liù diǎn qǐchuáng.
example_en: I usually get up at 6 a.m.

english_descriptive: used to describe doing two actions simultaneously
example_cn: 我一边吃饭，一边看电视。
example_pinyin: Wǒ yìbiān chīfàn, yìbiān kàn diànshì.
example_en: I eat while watching TV.

english_descriptive: without interruption or change
example_en: He has been working continuously.

english_concise: measure word for certain animals or one of a pair
english_descriptive: used to count animals or items that come in pairs
example_en: I have a dog.

english_descriptive: used to indicate exclusivity or condition
example_en: Only by working hard can one succeed.

english_descriptive: used to express a choice between options (usually in statements) or possibility
example_pinyin: Nǐ kěyǐ hē chá huòzhě kāfēi.
example_en: You can drink tea or coffee.

english_descriptive: indicating that something is very close to happening or being true
example_pinyin: Zhè jiàn shì wǒ jīhū wàng le.
example_en: I almost forgot about this matter.

english_descriptive: a favorable time or situation for doing something
example_cn: 这是一个很好的工作机会。
example_pinyin: Zhè shì yí gè hěn hǎo de gōngzuò jīhuì.
example_en: This is a very good job opportunity.

english_descriptive: used to indicate the highest degree, often placed after an adjective + 'le'
example_en: He is extremely happy.

english_descriptive: to recall information or retain something in memory
example_en: Do you still remember me?

english_descriptive: one of the four periods of the year (spring, summer, autumn, winter)
example_pinyin: Nǐ zuì xǐhuan nǎ gè jìjié?
example_en: Which season do you like the most?

english_descriptive: to examine something carefully or a medical checkup
example_pinyin: Qǐng jiǎnchá yíxià nǐ de zuòyè.
example_en: Please check your homework.

english_descriptive: easy to understand or do; not complicated
example_en: This problem is very simple.

english_descriptive: the state of being free from illness or injury
example_en: I wish you good health.

english_descriptive: to see someone face to face
example_en: We will meet at school tomorrow.

english_descriptive: to talk, give a speech, or explain a topic
example_cn: 请给我讲一下这个故事。
example_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ jiǎng yíxià zhège gùshi.
example_en: Please tell me this story.

english_descriptive: to give instruction or impart knowledge to someone
example_en: He teaches me how to swim.

english_descriptive: a unit of money (1/10 of a yuan); also a corner or horn
example_pinyin: Zhè zhī bǐ wǔ jiǎo qián.
example_en: This pen costs five dimes (0.5 Yuan).

english_descriptive: the body part used for standing and walking
example_cn: 因为走路太多，我的脚很疼。
example_pinyin: Yīnwèi zǒulù tài duō, wǒ de jiǎo hěn téng.
example_en: Because I walked too much, my feet hurt.

english_descriptive: to meet someone (at a station/airport), to catch, or to answer (a phone)
example_en: I am going to the airport to pick up a friend.

english_descriptive: a public road in a city or town
example_en: This street is very wide.

english_descriptive: to become husband and wife
example_en: They plan to get married next year.

english_descriptive: to come to a stop or conclusion
example_en: The meeting has already ended.

english_descriptive: a show or item on TV, radio, or in a performance
example_cn: 我对这个电视节目不感兴趣。
example_pinyin: Wǒ duì zhège diànshì jiémù bù gǎn xìngqù.
example_en: I am not interested in this TV program.

english_descriptive: a day or period of celebration
example_cn: 春节是中国最重要的节日。
example_pinyin: Chūnjié shì Zhōngguó zuì zhòngyào de jiérì.
example_en: Spring Festival is China's most important festival.

english_descriptive: to find an answer to a problem or difficulty
example_pinyin: Nǐ jiějué nàgè wèntí le ma?
example_en: Have you solved that problem?

english_descriptive: to take and use something with the promise to return it, or to lend something
example_pinyin: Wǒ kěyǐ jiè nǐ de bǐ ma?
example_en: Can I borrow your pen?

english_descriptive: many times; on many occasions
example_pinyin: Wǒ jīngcháng qù túshūguǎn kàn shū.
example_en: I often go to the library to read.

english_descriptive: to move past a place or experience a process
example_cn: 上班的时候我会经过一家花店。
example_pinyin: Shàngbān de shíhou wǒ huì jīngguò yì jiā huādiàn.
example_en: I pass by a flower shop when I go to work.

english_descriptive: a person responsible for controlling or administering a company or organization
example_pinyin: Wǒ yào jiàn nǐmen de jīnglǐ.
example_en: I want to see your manager.

english_descriptive: referring to a long duration of time
example_en: Long time no see!

english_descriptive: worn out or not new; referring to objects
example_pinyin: Zhè liàng chē tài jiù le.
example_en: This car is too old.

english_descriptive: a set of words expressing a complete thought
example_en: Please read this sentence.

english_descriptive: to make a choice or the choice that has been made
example_en: I have decided to go to China.

english_descriptive: feeling a need to drink something
example_pinyin: Wǒ hěn kě, xiǎng hē shuǐ.
example_en: I am thirsty and want to drink water.

english_descriptive: inspiring affection; charming
example_en: This panda is very cute.

english_descriptive: a unit of time equal to 15 minutes
example_pinyin: Xiànzài shì sān diǎn yí kè.
example_en: It is a quarter past three.

english_descriptive: a visitor who is welcomed into a home or event
example_en: Guests came to the house today.

english_descriptive: an appliance that cools air
example_pinyin: Wàimiàn hěn rè, qǐng kāi kōngtiáo.
example_en: It's hot outside, please turn on the air conditioner.

english_descriptive: the body part; also used to count total number of people in a family
example_pinyin: Wǒ jiā yǒu sān kǒu rén.
example_en: There are three people in my family.

english_descriptive: to shed tears as an expression of distress or pain
example_en: Why is the child crying?

english_descriptive: clothing worn on the lower body
example_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yì tiáo xīn kùzi.
example_en: I bought a new pair of pants.

english_descriptive: a pair of sticks used for eating
example_en: Can you use chopsticks?

english_descriptive: the color of the clear sky
example_en: The sky is blue.

english_descriptive: having lived for a long time; of advanced age
example_pinyin: Nà wèi lǎoshī hěn lǎo le.
example_en: That teacher is very old.

english_descriptive: to go away from a place or person
example_en: He is leaving Beijing tomorrow.

english_descriptive: something given to someone without payment
example_pinyin: Zhè shì sòng gěi nǐ de lǐwù.
example_en: This is a gift for you.

english_descriptive: the study of past events
example_en: I like Chinese history.

english_descriptive: the front part of a person's head
example_en: You need to go wash your face.

english_descriptive: to talk in a friendly, informal way
example_en: We are chatting right now.

english_descriptive: to do something repeatedly to improve; or the exercises themselves
example_en: We need to do more practice.

english_descriptive: used to count cars, bicycles, buses, etc.
example_en: Here is a taxi.

english_descriptive: to realize or have knowledge about a situation
example_pinyin: Wǒ duì zhège chéngshì hěn liǎojiě.
example_en: I know this city very well.

english_descriptive: a person living near or next door
example_en: My neighbor is very enthusiastic.

english_descriptive: to go to a foreign country to study
example_en: He wants to go to the US to study abroad.

english_descriptive: a building of two or more stories, or a specific floor level
example_en: I live on the third floor.

english_descriptive: the color of grass or leaves
example_en: In spring, the leaves turn green.

english_descriptive: a large four-legged animal used for riding
example_en: He knows how to ride a horse.

english_descriptive: at once; without delay
example_en: I will arrive immediately.

english_descriptive: to be pleased or content with something
example_cn: 经理对我的工作很满意。
example_pinyin: Jīnglǐ duì wǒ de gōngzuò hěn mǎnyì.
example_en: The manager is very satisfied with my work.

english_descriptive: a covering for the head
example_en: This hat looks very nice.

english_descriptive: a unit of length (meter); also refers to uncooked rice
example_pinyin: Zhè zhāng zhuōzi cháng liǎng mǐ.
example_en: This table is two meters long.

english_descriptive: food made of flour, water, and yeast
example_pinyin: Wǒ zǎocān chī miànbāo hé niúnǎi.
example_en: I eat bread and milk for breakfast.

english_descriptive: to comprehend something; or something is obvious
example_pinyin: Wǒ míngbai le nǐ de yìsi.
example_en: I understand what you mean.

english_descriptive: to grasp or carry something with one's hands
example_pinyin: Qǐng bāng wǒ ná yíxià zhè bēi shuǐ.
example_en: Please help me hold this glass of water.

english_descriptive: father's mother
example_en: Grandma loves me very much.

english_descriptive: the cardinal direction opposite to north
example_pinyin: Wǒ zài Zhōngguó de nánfāng zhǎngdà.
example_en: I grew up in the south of China.

english_descriptive: not easy; requiring effort or skill
example_en: This Chinese character is very difficult to write.

english_descriptive: feeling unhappy or sorrowful
example_cn: 听到这个坏消息，我很难过。
example_pinyin: Tīngdào zhège huài xiāoxi, wǒ hěn nánguò.
example_en: I was very sad to hear this bad news.

english_descriptive: a level of study in a school
example_pinyin: Nǐ de nǚ'ér shàng jǐ niánjí?
example_en: What grade is your daughter in?

english_descriptive: having lived for only a short time
example_pinyin: Zhèlǐ de yīshēng dōu hěn niánqīng.
example_en: The doctors here are all very young.

english_descriptive: an animal with feathers and wings
example_pinyin: Shù shàng yǒu yì zhī xiǎoniǎo.
example_en: There is a small bird on the tree.

english_descriptive: using a lot of effort or energy to do something
example_pinyin: Zhǐyào nǐ nǔlì, jiù néng chénggōng.
example_en: As long as you work hard, you can succeed.

english_descriptive: the activity of climbing a mountain
example_en: We often go mountain climbing on weekends.

english_descriptive: a flat dish used for holding food
example_pinyin: Qǐng bāng wǒ xǐ jǐ gè pánzi.
example_en: Please help me wash a few plates.

english_descriptive: having a lot of excess flesh on the body
example_pinyin: Zhè zhī māo tài pàng le.
example_en: This cat is too fat.

english_descriptive: an alcoholic drink made from grain
example_pinyin: Xiàtiān hē bīng píjiǔ hěn shūfu.
example_en: Drinking cold beer in summer is very comfortable.

english_descriptive: shoes made of leather material
example_pinyin: Tā chuān le yì shuāng hēi píxié.
example_en: He is wearing a pair of black leather shoes.

english_descriptive: a container with a narrow neck, used for storing liquids
example_pinyin: Píngzi lǐ hái yǒu shuǐ ma?
example_en: Is there still water in the bottle?

english_descriptive: used to indicate the real situation or contradict a previous statement
example_en: Actually, I don't know him.

english_descriptive: referring to people or things distinct from the ones already mentioned
example_cn: 除了小明，其他人都来了。
example_pinyin: Chúle Xiǎomíng, qítā rén dōu lái le.
example_en: Except for Xiaoming, the others have all come.

english_descriptive: to sit on and control a bicycle, motorcycle, or animal
example_en: I like to ride a bicycle.

english_descriptive: unusual or surprising; difficult to understand
example_cn: 我觉得这个声音很奇怪。
example_pinyin: Wǒ juéde zhège shēngyīn hěn qíguài.
example_en: I think this sound is very strange.

english_concise: to get up; (complement indicating upward movement)
english_descriptive: to rise to a standing position or out of bed; also indicates the start of an action
example_en: Stand up quickly!

english_descriptive: the action of an aircraft becoming airborne
example_pinyin: Fēijī mǎshàng jiù yào qǐfēi le.
example_en: The plane is about to take off immediately.

english_descriptive: easy to perceive, understand, or interpret
example_en: Did you see clearly?

english_descriptive: to request time off from work or school
example_en: I don't feel well and want to ask for leave.

english_descriptive: the season after summer and before winter
example_en: The weather is cool in autumn.

english_descriptive: a garment worn by women and girls
example_en: This skirt is very beautiful.

english_descriptive: used to indicate what happens next in a sequence
example_pinyin: Xiān chīfàn, ránhòu qù kàn diànyǐng.
example_en: Eat first, then go watch a movie.

english_descriptive: showing intense enjoyment, interest, or approval
example_en: The people here are very enthusiastic.

english_descriptive: to hold an opinion or belief
example_pinyin: Wǒ rènwéi tā shì duì de.
example_en: I think he is right.

english_descriptive: careful and diligent in one's work or actions
example_en: He studies very seriously.

english_descriptive: achieved without great effort; not difficult
example_en: This problem is very easy.

english_descriptive: introducing a conditional clause
example_cn: 如果明天不下雨，我们就去公园。
example_pinyin: Rúguǒ míngtiān bú xià yǔ, wǒmen jiù qù gōngyuán.
example_en: If it doesn't rain tomorrow, we will go to the park.

english_descriptive: a device for protection against rain or sun
example_pinyin: Wàimiàn xià yǔ le, dài bǎ sǎn ba.
example_en: It's raining outside, take an umbrella.

english_descriptive: to connect to or use the internet
example_en: I surf the internet every evening.

english_descriptive: to take offense or become annoyed
example_cn: 不要生气，他不是故意的。
example_pinyin: Búyào shēngqì, tā búshì gùyì de.
example_en: Don't get angry, he didn't do it on purpose.

english_descriptive: the sound produced by people or things
example_en: His voice sounds very nice.

english_descriptive: to attempt to do something or test something out
example_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng shì yíxià zhè jiàn yīfu.
example_en: I want to try on these clothes.

english_descriptive: the earth, together with all of its countries and peoples
example_pinyin: Shìjiè shàng yǒu hěn duō guójiā.
example_en: There are many countries in the world.

english_descriptive: having little fat or flesh; opposite of fat
example_pinyin: Tā zuìjìn shòu le hěn duō.
example_en: He has become much thinner recently.

english_descriptive: feeling physically relaxed or healthy
example_pinyin: Zuò zài shāfā shàng hěn shūfu.
example_en: Sitting on the sofa is very comfortable.

english_descriptive: father's younger brother; also used to address men of parents' generation
example_pinyin: Shūshu sòng gěi wǒ yì běn shū.
example_en: Uncle gave me a book.

english_descriptive: a woody perennial plant
example_pinyin: Gōngyuán lǐ yǒu hěn duō dà shù.
example_en: There are many big trees in the park.

english_descriptive: the study of numbers, shapes, and patterns
example_pinyin: Wǒ de shùxué chéngjì hěn hǎo.
example_en: My math grades are very good.

english_descriptive: the action of cleaning teeth with a brush
example_en: You need to brush your teeth before sleeping.

english_descriptive: two of something; a pair
example_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yì shuāng xié.
example_en: I bought a pair of shoes.

english_descriptive: degree of proficiency or quality
example_pinyin: Tā de Hànyǔ shuǐpíng hěn gāo.
example_en: His Chinese level is very high.

english_descriptive: a person who drives a vehicle
example_en: The taxi driver is very friendly.

english_descriptive: the star around which the earth orbits
example_en: The sun has come out.

english_descriptive: used to emphasize a quality; or something unique
example_en: This dish is especially delicious.

english_descriptive: to feel pain or ache
example_en: My head hurts a lot.

english_descriptive: to raise the level or quality of something
example_cn: 我想提高我的汉语水平。
example_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng tígāo wǒ de Hànyǔ shuǐpíng.
example_en: I want to improve my Chinese level.

english_descriptive: physical training or competitive games
example_en: He likes sports very much.

english_descriptive: having the taste of sugar or honey
example_en: This apple is very sweet.

english_descriptive: used for pants, roads, rivers, fish, etc.
example_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yì tiáo kùzi.
example_en: I bought a pair of pants.

english_descriptive: a person one works with
example_pinyin: Tā shì wǒ de xīn tóngshì.
example_en: He is my new colleague.

english_descriptive: to have the same opinion or give consent
example_en: I agree with your view.

english_descriptive: the hair on a person's head
example_en: Her hair is very long.

english_descriptive: happening quickly and unexpectedly
example_en: The event happened very suddenly.

english_descriptive: a building where books are kept for reading or borrowing
example_en: I go to the library to borrow books.

english_descriptive: the limb used for standing and walking
example_pinyin: Yīnwèi pǎobù, wǒ de tuǐ hěn suān.
example_en: Because of running, my legs are sore.

english_descriptive: to bring a task to an end
example_en: I have already completed the homework.

english_descriptive: a round, deep dish used for food
example_pinyin: Wǒ chī le yì wǎn miàntiáo.
example_en: I ate a bowl of noodles.

english_descriptive: the number 10,000
example_cn: 这个城市有一百万人口。
example_pinyin: Zhège chéngshì yǒu yìbǎi wàn rénkǒu.
example_en: This city has a population of one million.

english_descriptive: fail to remember
example_en: Don't forget to bring your passport.

english_descriptive: indicating the beneficiary of an action
example_en: I feel happy for you.

english_descriptive: indicating purpose
example_en: In order to be healthy, he exercises every day.

english_descriptive: used to count people with respect
example_en: There is a teacher here.

english_descriptive: arts, customs, and institutions of a nation or people
example_pinyin: Wǒ duì Zhōngguó wénhuà gǎn xìngqù.
example_en: I am interested in Chinese culture.

english_descriptive: the cardinal direction opposite to east
example_en: The sun sets in the west.

english_descriptive: a regular tendency or practice; to be accustomed to
example_en: I am used to getting up early.

english_descriptive: a room with a toilet and sink
example_en: Excuse me, where is the restroom?

english_descriptive: to wash one's body
example_en: I'll go take a shower first.

english_descriptive: the warmest season of the year
example_en: This year's summer is especially hot.

english_descriptive: before anything else
example_en: Please wash your hands first before eating.

english_descriptive: a long curved fruit with yellow skin
example_en: Do you want to eat a banana?

english_descriptive: to accept something as true or have faith in someone
example_pinyin: Wǒ xiāngxìn nǐ huì chénggōng de.
example_en: I believe you will succeed.

english_descriptive: in the direction of
example_en: Please walk towards the left.

english_descriptive: similar in appearance or nature
example_pinyin: Tā zhǎng de hěn xiàng tā gēge.
example_en: He looks very much like his older brother.

english_descriptive: taking care to avoid danger or mistakes
example_en: Be careful when crossing the road.

english_descriptive: the head of a school
example_en: The principal is having a meeting in the conference room.

english_descriptive: newly received information about current events
example_pinyin: Wǒ zài diànshì shàng kàn xīnwén.
example_en: I am watching the news on TV.

english_descriptive: recently made or obtained; not stale
example_en: These vegetables are very fresh.

english_descriptive: a plastic card used for making purchases on credit
example_en: Can I use a credit card here?

english_descriptive: a large container for carrying clothes and belongings when traveling
example_pinyin: Wǒ de xínglixiāng tài zhòng le.
example_en: My suitcase is too heavy.

english_descriptive: a bear native to China, known for its black and white coat
example_en: We are going to the zoo to see pandas.

english_descriptive: to require something essential or important
example_en: I need your help.

english_descriptive: to pick the best option from several possibilities
example_pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào zuò yí gè xuǎnzé.
example_en: We need to make a choice.

english_descriptive: something that is asked for or needed
example_en: This is the company's requirement.

english_descriptive: father's father
example_en: Grandfather is 80 years old this year.

english_descriptive: without doubt; fixed or specific
example_en: I will definitely go tomorrow.

english_descriptive: including everything or everyone
example_en: How much are these books altogether?

english_descriptive: a short period of time
example_pinyin: Qǐng děng yíhuìr, tā mǎshàng lái.
example_en: Please wait a moment, he's coming right away.

english_descriptive: not different; identical
example_pinyin: Wǒ hé nǐ de xiǎngfǎ yíyàng.
example_en: My idea is the same as yours.

english_descriptive: at an earlier time or in the past
example_en: I lived here before.

english_descriptive: usual, common, or average
example_pinyin: Zhōumò wǒ yìbān zài jiā xiūxi.
example_en: I generally rest at home on weekends.

english_descriptive: used to describe two actions happening at the same time (while...)
example_cn: 他一边跑步，一边听音乐。
example_pinyin: Tā yìbiān pǎobù, yìbiān tīng yīnyuè.
example_en: He listens to music while running.

english_descriptive: continuously doing something or going in one direction
example_en: It has been raining continuously.

english_descriptive: vocal or instrumental sounds combined in a harmonious way
example_en: I like listening to classical music.

english_descriptive: a financial institution
example_en: I am going to the bank to withdraw money.

english_descriptive: liquids for drinking, other than water or medicine
example_en: What beverage would you like to drink?

english_descriptive: used to indicate obligation, duty, or correctness
example_en: You should go to sleep earlier.

english_descriptive: the effect something has on something else
example_en: Don't affect others' rest.

english_descriptive: to employ something for a purpose
example_en: I use a computer to work.

english_descriptive: an activity engaged in for amusement
example_en: The children are playing games.

english_descriptive: known about by many people
example_en: This place is very famous.

english_descriptive: indicates repetition of an action (usually in the past)
example_cn: 昨天下了雨，今天又下了。
example_pinyin: Zuótiān xià le yǔ, jīntiān yòu xià le.
example_en: It rained yesterday, and it rained again today.

english_descriptive: to come across someone or something unexpectedly
example_cn: 我在街上遇到了老朋友。
example_pinyin: Wǒ zài jiē shàng yùdào le lǎo péngyou.
example_en: I ran into an old friend on the street.

english_descriptive: the basic unit of money in China
example_en: This book is 50 yuan.

english_descriptive: to agree or be ready to do something
example_en: I am willing to help you.

english_descriptive: the natural satellite of the earth
example_en: The moon is very round tonight.

english_descriptive: used in the structure 'yue... yue...' to indicate increasing degree
example_en: The rain is getting heavier and heavier.

english_descriptive: a place where trains/buses stop; or the action of standing up
example_en: I am waiting for you at the train station.

english_descriptive: a common Chinese surname; also a measure word for flat objects (paper, tables)
example_pinyin: Zhāng xiānsheng mǎi le yì zhāng zhuōzi.
example_en: Mr. Zhang bought a table.

english_descriptive: to increase in size or age
example_en: The child has grown taller.

english_descriptive: feeling worry or unease about something
example_en: Don't worry, take your time.

english_concise: to look after; to care for
english_descriptive: to attend to the needs of someone
example_en: She is at home looking after the child.

english_descriptive: an image created by a camera
example_pinyin: Zhè shì yì zhāng lǎo zhàopiàn.
example_en: This is an old photo.

english_descriptive: a device for taking photographs
example_pinyin: Wǒ dài le zhàoxiàngjī qù lǚxíng.
example_en: I brought a camera for the trip.

english_concise: measure word (for birds, certain animals, one of a pair)
english_descriptive: used for birds, cats, dogs, etc., or one of a pair (like hands, ears)
example_pinyin: Shù shàng yǒu yì zhī niǎo.
example_en: There is a bird on the tree.

english_descriptive: indicating nothing else or nothing more
example_pinyin: Wǒ zhǐ ài nǐ yí gè rén.
example_en: I only love you.

english_descriptive: used to indicate a necessary condition for a result
example_cn: 只有努力学习，才能考好。
example_pinyin: Zhǐyǒu nǔlì xuéxí, cáinéng kǎo hǎo.
example_en: Only by studying hard can one do well on the exam.

english_descriptive: the language spoken by Chinese people
example_en: I am learning Chinese.

english_descriptive: the point or position at an equal distance from the sides or ends
example_cn: 由于晚了，他只能坐在中间。
example_pinyin: Yóuyú wǎn le, tā zhǐnéng zuò zài zhōngjiān.
example_en: Because he was late, he could only sit in the middle.

english_descriptive: used when a desired result is achieved after a long time or effort
example_en: The rain finally stopped.

english_descriptive: a group of things with common characteristics
example_en: This kind of apple is very delicious.

english_descriptive: of great significance or value
example_pinyin: Zhè shì yí gè zhòngyào de juédìng.
example_en: This is an important decision.

english_descriptive: Saturday and Sunday
example_en: What are you going to do this weekend?

english_descriptive: most important or significant
example_en: This is the main problem.

english_concise: to pay attention to; be careful
english_descriptive: to take notice or be cautious
example_pinyin: Guò mǎlù shí qǐng zhùyì ānquán.
example_en: Please pay attention to safety when crossing the road.

english_descriptive: referring to the person speaking or the subject of the sentence
example_en: I believe in myself.

english_descriptive: a vehicle composed of two wheels held in a frame one behind the other
example_en: I know how to ride a bicycle.

english_descriptive: at all times; invariably
example_en: He is always very busy.

english_descriptive: the opening in the lower part of the human face
example_en: Open your mouth.

english_descriptive: coming at the end of a series
example_en: This is the last chance.

english_descriptive: not long ago
example_en: How have you been (health-wise) recently?

english_descriptive: schoolwork that a student is required to do at home
example_en: There is a lot of homework today.
